argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngcrescrhm.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 2 |  | rngcrescrhm.c | |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | rngcrescrhm.r | |- ( ph -> R = ( Ring i^i U ) ) |
| 4 |  | rngcrescrhm.h | |- H = ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( RngCat ` U ) |`cat H ) = ( ( RngCat ` U ) |`cat H ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_rhmsubc | |- ( ph -> H e. ( Subcat ` ( RngCat ` U ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_subccat | |- ( ph -> ( ( RngCat ` U ) |`cat H ) e. Cat ) |
